m_szDocTitle: Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rally After Unveiling New Energy Business? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rally After Unveiling New Energy Business? By Kurumi Fukushima | 05/01/15 - 11:07 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc  ( TSLA - Get Report ) are lower by 1.39% to $222.90 in late morning trading Friday, after the electric car maker unveiled its new business  called Tesla Energy in an event late Thursday. The company said it is moving into the energy storage space, and will focus on energy efficient batteries for homes and businesses.
